author: FourFourTwo
description: Gabriel Jesus, Kevin De Bruyne and Yaya Toure were on target as Manchester City beat West Brom to virtually seal Champions League football.
title: Manchester City 3 West Brom 1: Champions League all-but secured as Etihad celebrates Zabaleta

author: Thomas Bristow
description: Manchester City beat Stoke on Tuesday night 3-1, thanks to goals from Gabriel Jesus, Kevin de Bruyne and Yaya Toure
title: Pep Guardiola's brilliant excuse for turning up late involved alcohol

author: talkSPORT
description: Manchester City moved up to third in the Premier League with a comfortable 3-1 win over West Brom on an emotional night at the Etihad Stadium. Goals from Gabriel Jesus, Kevin De Bruyne and Yaya Toure saw City cruise to victory on Pablo Zabaleta's final home appearance for the club. West Brom were outplayed but claimed a late consolation through substitute Hal Robson-Kanu.
title: Manchester City 3-1 West Brom: Citizens secure resounding win in Pablo Zabaleta's send-off
